alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 19 at 7:55PM HST until December 20 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR MAUI KAHOOLAWE AND THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR HALEAKALA SUMMIT THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND LANAI THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with localized gusts over 50 mph. * WHERE...Lanai and Molokai. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to drive, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
